page.title: BJ's Profit Rises; Food, Gas Sales Strong
page.text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - BJ's Wholesale Club Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=BJ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">BJ.N</A> on Tuesday posted higher quarterly profit as soaring gasoline prices and strong demand for food boosted sales.
